name: Nemesis (itch) (shrodes)
description:
A space themed dodge-em-up made for the #stopwaitingforgodot game jam.
This is my first game developed using Godot and my first game jam!

Instructions

Stay alive in your ship as as long as possible by avoiding the asteroids.
There are different galaxies to explore every game, and every game is completely randomised, so keep trying for that high score!

Keys

  • WASD / directional keys to pilot your ship
  • Enter / Space to start the game
  • R to restart

Leaderboard

  • Me, game dev extraordinaire: 43
  • PDTM: 34

Credits

Many thanks to the wonderful creators here on itch.io for providing free use assets.

  • Sprites / Music / SFX - Ultimate Space Game Mega Asset Pack (8000+ Items: Music + SFX + BG + Units + GUI + More) by GameSupplyGuy (itch.io)
  • Backgrounds - Pixel Space Background Generator by Deep-Fold (itch.io)
  • Developed with Godot Engine 3.3.3
